summary: This is an email chain from April 16, 2020, among personnel from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS), discussing scheduling a conference call to review a prosecution memo related to the Epstein investigation. The primary participants are Geoffrey Berman and several other individuals whose names are redacted.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.context: He is the recipient and sender of emails, coordinating a conference call to discuss the Epstein investigation prosecution memo.

events.title: Scheduled Conference Call on Epstein Prosecution Memo
events.description: A conference call was scheduled for Monday at 11:00 AM to discuss the Epstein investigation prosecution memo.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was actively reviewing a prosecution memo related to the Epstein investigation in April 2020.
Geoffrey Berman, then U.S. Attorney for the SDNY, was directly involved in coordinating the review of the prosecution memo.
Multiple individuals within the USANYS office were involved in the discussion, but their names are redacted in the document.
A conference call was scheduled for April 20, 2020, to discuss the memo, indicating ongoing legal proceedings related to Epstein at that time.
